00059 class OSIMSIMULATION_API Marker : public AbstractMarker
00060 {

00064 //=============================================================================

00071     PropertyBool _fixedProp;
00072     bool &_fixed;
00073 
00074     // The bodyName property is used only for markers that are part of a
00075     // MarkerSet, not for ones that are part of a model.
00076     PropertyStr _bodyNameProp;
00077     std::string &_bodyName;
00078 
00079     // Body that the marker is attached to

00081
